title: Posting to update board level
body: Board show me as level 3 (or something similar), account is level 30. Read that making a post will force it to update and fix that.

replies.body: We also have a [syncing tool](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool) that may help!

Did not work :(

Can now upvote threads but not post. So confusing! I just want to post my mspaint lulu!
